TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit IssuedTokenClientCredential extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示用來從安全性權杖服務取得核發之權杖的資訊。

span.span: Represents information used to obtain an issued token from a security token service.

span.span: Gets or sets the default value of .
The value of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當用戶端與安全性權杖服務進行 WS-Trust 交換以取得核發的權杖時，有時必須與安全性權杖服務交換金鑰 Entropy，才能達成共用的對稱金鑰。When the client does WS-Trust exchange with the Security Token Service to obtain the issued token, it sometimes must exchange key entropy with the Security Token Service to arrive at a shared symmetric key. 安全性權杖服務通常會指定要在其繫結中使用的 Entropy 交換機制。The Security Token Service typically specifies the entropy exchange mechanism to use in its binding. 如果未在安全性權杖服務的繫結中指定這樣的機制，則會使用 `DefaultKeyEntropyMode` 值來與安全性權杖服務交換 Entropy。If no such mechanism is specified in the Security Token Service's binding, the `DefaultKeyEntropyMode` value is used to exchange entropy with the Security Token Service. ## Examples 這段程式碼將示範如何設定這個屬性。This code shows how to set this property. [!code-csharp[c_CreateSTS#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_creatests/cs/source.cs#17)] [!code-vb[c_CreateSTS#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_creatests/vb/source.vb#17)]

exception.span: 已嘗試設定 () 唯讀的認證。

span.span: An attempt was made to a read-only credential.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int IssuedTokenRenewalThresholdPercentage { int get(); void set(int value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定發行之權杖的更新臨界值百分比。

span.span: Gets or sets the renewal threshold percentage for issued tokens.

value.span: 發行之權杖的更新臨界值百分比。

span.span: The renewal threshold percentage for issued tokens.
The default value is 60.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用戶端會快取核發的權杖，而且當快取的已核發權杖快要過期時，用戶端會自動從安全性權杖服務取得新核發的權杖。The client caches issued tokens and when a cached issued token is going to expire in the near future, the client automatically gets a fresh issued token from the Security Token Service. 這個屬性的值會決定已快取之已核發權杖的有效期間必須已超過多少百分比，才可以取得新核發的權杖。The value of this property determines what percentage of the cached issued token's validity period must be over before getting a fresh issued token. 例如，如果這個屬性的值為 60，而用戶端取得有效期為 100 分鐘的核發權杖，這時用戶端會重複使用該快取的已核發權杖，待過了 60 分鐘之後，再從安全性權杖服務取得新核發的權杖。For example, if this property's value is 60, and the client gets an issued token that is valid for 100 minutes, it reuses the cached issued token for 60 minutes, after which it gets a fresh issued token from the Security Token Service. ## Examples 這段程式碼將示範如何設定這個屬性。This code shows how to set this property. [!code-csharp[c_CreateSTS#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_creatests/cs/source.cs#16)] [!code-vb[c_CreateSTS#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_creatests/vb/source.vb#16)]

exception.span: 已嘗試設定 () 唯讀的認證。

span.span: An attempt was made to a read-only credential.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IssuerChannelBehaviors As Dictionary(Of Uri, KeyedByTypeCollection(Of IEndpointBehavior))

summary.span: 取得簽發者通道行為的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of issuer channel behaviors.
A of s.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字典索引鍵是用戶端要與其通訊之安全性權杖服務的 URI。The dictionary keys are the URIs of the Security Token Services that the client wants to communicate with. 每個 URI 的項目應用程式使用 wcf 建立的通道中，從安全性權杖服務取得核發的權杖的端點行為。The entry for each URI is a of the endpoint behaviors that the application uses in the channels created by WCF to get the issued tokens from the Security Token Services.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::EndpointAddress ^ LocalIssuerAddress { System::ServiceModel::EndpointAddress ^ get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::EndpointAddress ^ value); };
member this.LocalIssuerAddress : System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定本機簽發者的位址。

span.span: Gets or sets the address of the local issuer.
The of the local issuer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從安全性權杖服務取得核發的權杖時，用戶端應用程式必須以安全性權杖服務的位址加以設定。When obtaining an issued token from a Security Token Service, the client application must be configured with the address of the Security Token Service. 這項資訊可以由目標服務在其安全性原則中加以指定。This information can be specified by the target service in its security policy. 如果目標服務未在其安全性原則中指定這項資訊，會使用用戶端的 WCF 通道`LocalIssuerAddress`做為安全性權杖服務取得核發之權杖的位址。In case the target service does not specify this information in its security policy, the client's WCF channel uses the `LocalIssuerAddress` as the address of the Security Token Service from which to obtain the issued token. ## Examples 這段程式碼將示範如何設定這個屬性。This code shows how to set this property. [!code-csharp[c_CreateSTS#31](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_creatests/cs/source.cs#31)]

exception.span: 已嘗試設定 () 唯讀的認證。

span.span: An attempt was made to a read-only credential.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::Channels::Binding ^ LocalIssuerBinding { System::ServiceModel::Channels::Binding ^ get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::Channels::Binding ^ value); };
member this.LocalIssuerBinding : System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定本機簽發者的繫結。

span.span: Gets or sets the binding of the local issuer.
The of the local issuer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從安全性權杖服務取得核發的權杖時，用戶端應用程式必須透過繫結設定為與安全性權杖服務進行通訊。When obtaining an issued token from a Security Token Service, the client application must be configured with the binding to use to communicate with the Security Token Service. 如果目標服務未在其安全性原則中指定安全性權杖服務的相關資訊，用戶端的 WCF 通道使用 localissuerbinding 做為繫結使用與安全性權杖服務進行通訊。In case the target service does not specify information about the Security Token Service in its security policy, the client's WCF channel uses the LocalIssuerBinding as the binding to use to communicate with the Security Token Service. ## Examples 這段程式碼將示範如何設定這個屬性。This code shows how to set this property. [!code-csharp[c_CreateSTS#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_creatests/cs/source.cs#13)] [!code-vb[c_CreateSTS#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_creatests/vb/source.vb#13)]

exception.span: 已嘗試設定 () 唯讀的認證。

summary.span: 取得本機簽發者通道行為的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of local issuer channel behaviors.
A of s.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是應用程式使用 wcf 建立的通道中，從本機安全性權杖服務取得核發的權杖的端點行為。This is a of the endpoint behaviors that the application uses in the channels created by WCF to get the issued tokens from the local Security Token Service. ## Examples 這段程式碼將示範如何設定這個屬性。This code shows how to set this property. [!code-csharp[c_CreateSTS#32](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_creatests/cs/source.cs#32)]

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定發行之權杖的最大快取時間。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum caching time for an issued token.

value.span: ，表示發行之權杖的最大快取時間。

span.span: A that represents the maximum caching time for an issued token.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，從安全性權杖服務取得核發的權杖會由 WCF 用戶端通道快取。By default, issued tokens obtained from the Security Token Service are cached by the WCF client channel. 這個屬性可讓應用程式指定通道快取已核發之權杖的最長時間。This property enables the application to specify the maximum time that the channel caches the issued token. ## Examples 這段程式碼將示範如何設定這個屬性。This code shows how to set this property. [!code-csharp[c_CreateSTS#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_creatests/cs/source.cs#15)] [!code-vb[c_CreateSTS#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_creatests/vb/source.vb#15)]

span.span: The value of is less than zero.
